gumga-generic-filter-ng
  • {{ctrl.version}}
    • {{version}}

Descrição

O componente gumga-generic-filter-ng é um filtro genérico que até agora permite aplicar filtros para datas no formato pt-br, em CPF e CNPJ.

Instalação

// npm
npm i gumga-generic-filter-ng --save

// bower
bower install gumga-generic-filter-ng --save
Usando

HTML filter:

Data: {{ctrl.html.date | gumgaGenericFilter:'date'}}

CPF: {{ctrl.html.cpf | gumgaGenericFilter:'cpf'}}

CNPJ: {{ctrl.html.cnpj | gumgaGenericFilter:'cnpj'}}

JS filter:

Data: {{ctrl.js.date}}

CPF: {{ctrl.js.cpf}}

CNPJ: {{ctrl.js.cnpj}}

  • HTML
  • JavaScript
<p>Data: {{ctrl.js.date}}</p>
<p>CPF: {{ctrl.js.cpf}} </p>
<p>CNPJ: {{ctrl.js.cnpj}}</p>
<p>Data: {{ctrl.html.date | gumgaGenericFilter:'date'}}</p>
<p>CPF: {{ctrl.html.cpf | gumgaGenericFilter:'cpf'}} </p>
<p>CNPJ: {{ctrl.html.cnpj | gumgaGenericFilter:'cnpj'}}</p>

angular.module('app', ['gumga.genericfilter'])
  .controller('Ctrl', function ($filter) {
    var ctrl = this;
    ctrl.html = {
      date: '29121986',
      cpf: '32165498700',
      cnpj: '11131821000183'
    }
    ctrl.js = {
      date: $filter('gumgaGenericFilter')('29121986', 'date'),
      cpf: $filter('gumgaGenericFilter')('32165498700', 'cpf'),
      cnpj: $filter('gumgaGenericFilter')('11131821000183', 'cnpj')
    }
  })
